org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor

Class AccessHistoryStorageElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.SimpleStorageElement
      • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.AccessHistoryStorageElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StorageElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EconomicBinomialStorageElement, EconomicZipfStorageElement, LfuStorageElement, LruStorageElement

    public class AccessHistoryStorageElement
extends SimpleStorageElement
    An extension of SimpleStorageElement which keeps a record of file accesses. This is implemented as a TreeMap mapping a Date to a DataFile. When a file is accessed on the SE a new entry is added to the access history. Optimisation algorithms in StorageElement classes that extend this class use the recent access history to evaluate the relative values of files stored on the SE.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accessFile(DataFile file)
      Updated the access history.
      java.util.TreeMap getRecentAccessHistory(long dt)
      Return the most recent section of the access history, covering the dt milliseconds up to the last entry.
      java.util.TreeMap getRecentAccessHistoryIndices(long dt)
      Return the most recent section of the access history, but mapped to the file indices rather than the files themselves.
